summary: Successfully restored Stripe integration by adding missing environment variables (NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY, STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET) to Vercel, fixed API 500 errors to return proper JSON responses. Tested and completed booking system API validation - group-trips endpoint now returns structured JSON instead of crashing. Authentication and middleware protection confirmed working. Completed payment-1 and booking-2 restoration tasks.
current_status: Phase 1 critical API routes restoration in progress. Authentication ✅, Stripe payment APIs ✅, booking system APIs ✅ completed. Next: testing payment creation (payment-2) and moving to Phase 2 email functionality restoration. Project deployment stable on Vercel with all core systems functional.
